description: LLM Agent Observability Dashboard - Azure Application Insights + OpenTelemetry

azureLogAnalytics.query:
let stats = dependencies
| summarize 
    ['Total Traces'] = dcount(operation_Id),
    ['Total Spans'] = count(),
    ['Avg Latency (s)'] = round(avg(duration) / 1000, 2),
    ['Success Rate (%)'] = round(countif(success == "True") * 100.0 / count(), 1),
    ['Error Count'] = countif(success == "False"),
    ['Unique Users'] = dcount(user_Id);
stats

dependencies 
| summarize 
    Successful = countif(success == "True"),
    Failed = countif(success == "False")
    by bin(timestamp, $__interval)

dependencies
| summarize 
    P50 = round(percentile(duration, 50) / 1000, 2),
    P95 = round(percentile(duration, 95) / 1000, 2),
    P99 = round(percentile(duration, 99) / 1000, 2)
    by bin(timestamp, $__interval)

panels.description: Top operations by call count and latency

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies 
| summarize 
    Count = count(),
    ['Avg (s)'] = round(avg(duration) / 1000, 2),
    ['P95 (s)'] = round(percentile(duration, 95) / 1000, 2),
    ['Success %'] = round(countif(success == "True") * 100.0 / count(), 1)
    by Operation = name
| order by Count desc
| limit 20

panels.title: Top Operations

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies 
| summarize 
    avg_duration = round(avg(duration) / 1000, 2)
    by operation_name = name
| order by avg_duration desc
| limit 10

panels.description: LLM call statistics and token usage

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies
| where name has_any ("ChatOpenAI", "AzureChatOpenAI", "openai", "llm", "gen_ai", "chat")
| summarize
    ['LLM Calls'] = count(),
    ['Input Tokens'] = sum(toint(coalesce(customDimensions['gen_ai.usage.input_tokens'], customDimensions['llm.usage.prompt_tokens'], "0"))),
    ['Output Tokens'] = sum(toint(coalesce(customDimensions['gen_ai.usage.output_tokens'], customDimensions['llm.usage.completion_tokens'], "0"))),
    ['Avg LLM Latency (s)'] = round(avg(duration) / 1000, 2)

panels.title: LLM Summary

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies
| where name has_any ("ChatOpenAI", "AzureChatOpenAI", "openai", "llm", "gen_ai", "chat")
| summarize 
    Input = sum(toint(coalesce(customDimensions['gen_ai.usage.input_tokens'], customDimensions['llm.usage.prompt_tokens'], "0"))),
    Output = sum(toint(coalesce(customDimensions['gen_ai.usage.output_tokens'], customDimensions['llm.usage.completion_tokens'], "0")))
    by bin(timestamp, $__interval)

dependencies
| where name has_any ("ChatOpenAI", "AzureChatOpenAI", "openai", "llm", "gen_ai", "chat")
| extend model = coalesce(
    tostring(customDimensions['gen_ai.request.model']),
    tostring(customDimensions['llm.request.model']),
    tostring(customDimensions['model']),
    "unknown"
)
| summarize 
    Calls = count(),
    ['Avg (s)'] = round(avg(duration) / 1000, 2),
    ['P95 (s)'] = round(percentile(duration, 95) / 1000, 2),
    ['Input Tokens'] = sum(toint(coalesce(customDimensions['gen_ai.usage.input_tokens'], customDimensions['llm.usage.prompt_tokens'], "0"))),
    ['Output Tokens'] = sum(toint(coalesce(customDimensions['gen_ai.usage.output_tokens'], customDimensions['llm.usage.completion_tokens'], "0")))
    by Model = model
| order by Calls desc

dependencies
| summarize 
    Timestamp = min(timestamp),
    ['Root Operation'] = take_any(name),
    ['Duration (s)'] = round(max(duration) / 1000, 2),
    Spans = count(),
    HasError = countif(success == "False") > 0
    by TraceId = operation_Id
| extend Status = iff(HasError, "Failed", "Success")
| project Timestamp, TraceId, ['Root Operation'], ['Duration (s)'], Spans, Status
| order by Timestamp desc
| limit 100

panels.description: LangGraph task-level execution flow (LLM calls, MCP calls, tool calls)

azureLogAnalytics.query:
dependencies
| where operation_Id == "$traceId"
| where name endswith ".task"
| order by timestamp asc
| extend seq = row_number()
| project id = tostring(seq), title = name, subtitle = strcat(round(duration, 0), " ms"), mainstat = round(duration, 0), arc__success = iff(success == "True", 1.0, 0.0), arc__failed = iff(success == "False", 1.0, 0.0)

dependencies
| where operation_Id == "$traceId"
| where name endswith ".task"
| order by timestamp asc
| extend seq = row_number()
| where seq > 1
| project id = strcat(tostring(seq - 1), "-", tostring(seq)), source = tostring(seq - 1), target = tostring(seq)

panels.title: Task Execution Flow

panels.description: Distributed trace view for selected trace
panels.title: Trace Waterfall

azureLogAnalytics.query:
exceptions
| summarize Errors = count() by bin(timestamp, $__interval)

exceptions
| summarize Count = count() by Type = type
| order by Count desc
| limit 10

exceptions
| project 
    Timestamp = timestamp,
    TraceId = operation_Id,
    Type = type,
    Message = outerMessage
| order by Timestamp desc
| limit 50

list.description: Select a trace to view details
list.label: Trace ID
list.name: traceId

title: LLM Agent Observability
